project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions and keeps track of the user's score.

task.name: Create a function to display questions and gather user answers
Implement score tracking and feedback for each answer
Calculate final score and display the result to the user
Write tests for each of the game functions (question display, score tracking, etc.)
Execute tests on the quiz game to ensure that it functions correctly
